name: Peruvian Punch
description: This cocktail from the summer menu at The Trilby in New York City is tropical but not too sweet—drink it at the beach, or drink it while wishing you were at the beach.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add pisco, Combier, falernum, lime, pineapple, and orange juices to the shaker and shake well.
Fill a Collins glass with ice. Strain cocktail into serving glass, top off with soda. Garnish with orange wheel and serve.
